activity_name: Record the data of each patient

substeps.description: Greet the patient and explain the registration process
Prepare the registration form or system

activity_name: Register the SSN of the patient

substeps.description: Ask the patient for their Social Security Number (SSN)
Verify the SSN format for accuracy
Input the SSN into the registration system

activity_name: Register the Name of the patient

substeps.description: Ask the patient for their first name
Confirm the spelling of the name with the patient
Enter the name into the registration system

activity_name: Register the Surname of the patient

substeps.description: Ask the patient for their surname (last name)
Confirm the spelling of the surname with the patient
Enter the surname into the registration system
Generate the referral document using the registered information
Review the document for accuracy and completeness

activity_name: Archive the record in file system

substeps.description: Prepare the patient's record for archiving
Store the physical record in the appropriate file system
Update the database with the record's storage location
